nodes.text: Mitrinomon Transports were the company that produced the Z-6 jetpack. Their jetpack was used by the bounty hunters Jango and Boba Fett as well as commandos from the planet Mandalore.

Mitrinomon Transports were first mentioned in Galladinium's Fantastic Technology, a supplement released in 1995 for West End Games' Star Wars Legends Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The company were confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
